summary: Build a web-based professional CV maker where users can log in, enter detailed information across necessary sections, upload a photo, and instantly generate a polished CV.

existing_features.title: Add authentication using Internet Identity and create a dedicated Login page that lets users sign in and sign out.

Create a CV Builder page with a structured form that collects professional CV details across necessary sections, including at minimum: Personal Details, Professional Summary, Work Experience, Education, Skills, Projects, and Certifications/Awards (as optional).
Implement a photo upload feature in the CV Builder that allows the user to add a profile photo and include it in the generated CV output.
Provide an instant CV generation experience: as the user fills the form, show a professional CV preview template that updates immediately, and provide a way to export/print the CV from the browser.

Add a coherent visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) that feels professional and is applied consistently across Login, Builder, and Preview screens (avoid a blue/purple default palette).
Redesign the CV preview template to look more professional and modern while keeping all existing CV fields and real-time updates intact.
Refine print-specific styling for the CV preview so the new modern design renders consistently when users click “Print / Save as PDF”.

new_feature_requests.summary: User authentication with login page for the CV builder website
CV form with necessary sections for proper details (e.g., personal info, education, experience, skills, projects)
Photo upload and inclusion in the generated CV
Instant CV generation from entered data (professional CV output)
Provide a professional CV layout/template for the generated CV
Persist each user’s CV data in the Motoko backend keyed by the authenticated user principal, with APIs to create/update, fetch, and clear/reset the saved CV.
Improve the generated CV design to be more professional and modern (refine the preview/template styling and layout)
